## 🌍 Top 5 Global Fintech News

- **[Fintech founder charged with fraud; AI app found to be humans in the Philippines](https://techcrunch.com/2025/04/10/fintech-founder-charged-with-fraud-after-ai-shopping-app-found-to-be-powered-by-humans-in-the-philippines/)** — *Hacker News* — A fintech founder faces fraud charges after their AI-powered shopping app was revealed to be operated by human workers in the Philippines rather than actual artificial intelligence.

- **[Americans see their savings vanish in Synapse fintech crisis](https://www.cnbc.com/2024/11/22/synapse-bankruptcy-thousands-of-americans-see-their-savings-vanish.html)** — *Hacker News* — Thousands of Americans lost access to their savings following the collapse of Synapse, a fintech middleware company, highlighting serious risks in the bank-as-a-service model.

- **[Jack Dorsey's Block cuts thousands of jobs as it embraces AI](https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cq570d12y9do?at_medium=RSS&at_campaign=rss)** — *BBC Business* — Payments and fintech company Block, co-founded by Jack Dorsey, is laying off thousands of employees as it accelerates its adoption of artificial intelligence across operations.

- **[Apple acquires UK open banking startup Credit Kudos](https://ffnews.com/newsarticle/apple-acquires-uk-open-banking-startup-credit-kudos/)** — *Hacker News* — Apple has acquired UK-based open banking startup Credit Kudos, signalling the tech giant's growing ambitions in financial data and consumer credit services.

- **[Fintech is making credit cards weirder](https://workweek.com/2022/08/05/fintech-is-making-credit-cards-weirder/)** — *Hacker News* — Fintech innovation is pushing credit card products into new territory with increasingly niche rewards, embedded features, and non-traditional structures that challenge conventional banking models.

## 🍁 Top 5 Canadian Fintech News

- **[Real estate investment platform Addy enters restructuring one year after fine from regulators](https://betakit.com/real-estate-investment-platform-addy-enters-restructuring-one-year-after-fine-from-regulators/)** — *BetaKit* — Canadian real estate fintech platform Addy has entered restructuring proceedings just one year after receiving a regulatory fine, raising concerns about compliance challenges facing Canadian investment platforms.

- **[Private equity firm Novacap closes seventh and largest tech fund](https://betakit.com/private-equity-firm-novacap-closes-seventh-and-largest-tech-fund/)** — *BetaKit* — Montreal-based private equity firm Novacap has closed its seventh and largest technology-focused fund, signalling continued investor appetite for Canadian tech and fintech ventures.

- **[Canada calls screen scraping 'unsecure,' sets Open Banking target for 2023](https://finledger.com/2021/08/09/canada-sets-open-banking-target-for-2023/)** — *Hacker News* — Canada's federal government flagged screen scraping as a security risk and committed to an open banking framework, a regulatory journey still highly relevant to Canadian fintechs navigating implementation today.

- **[Open Banking and Payments Competition](https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/open-banking-and-payments-competition/)** — *Hacker News* — This in-depth analysis explores how open banking frameworks reshape payments competition, with direct relevance to Canada's ongoing open banking rollout and its impact on Canadian fintechs and credit unions.

- **[Mark's disability payments end soon and his CPP payments will be reduced. What can he do?](https://financialpost.com/personal-finance/retirement/how-budget-plan-uncertain-life-expectancy)** — *Financial Post* — A Financial Post personal finance column highlights the financial planning gaps facing vulnerable Canadians, underscoring the importance of inclusive fintech solutions that address accessibility and retirement security.
